content: this is a pdf crochet pattern not a physical product that contain step-by-step instruction on how to make this pretty shell flap bag youtube video tutorial 1 also available as a simple guide only for the size i made and feel free to reach me on my social if there is something i can help with this pattern is made-to-measure written in us terminology skill level beginner to advance beginner this pattern is personal use only do not copy and resell this pattern you may sell your finished item as long as you mention me @vivreflou and please do not mass production for this design do not use my picture to advertise your finished product material size 4 medium acrylic yarn approx 125gr to make 23 x 13 x 7 cm * i m using borneo by onitsuga feel free to use any yarn available for you * 4 0mm crochet hook * if you use other yarn use the recommended hook size * magnet button a pair of scissors tapestry needle stitch marker chain strap optional abbreviation chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch increase increase sts stitches magic_ring magic_ring bl back loop fl front loop 1 https //youtu be/ycticyhurny
